channel.title: Server wont work on Mac computers, would really like some help
channel.description: I am in the process of coding and running my server, and we have a .jar run file for Mac users to launch the client. Like I said, it runs perfectly for all Windows users, but Mac users get stuck and eventually when they log in the connection times out. I dont understand it, and would really like some help. Thanks.

item.title: Server wont work on Mac computers, would really like some help
item.dc:creator: @rynds1 rynds1
item.description:
@rynds1 wrote:

I am in the process of coding and running my server, and we have a .jar run file for Mac users to launch the client. Like I said, it runs perfectly for all Windows users, but Mac users get stuck and eventually when they log in the connection times out. I dont understand it, and would really like some help. Thanks.
